# deleteWidget

Deletes the specified widget.

| request | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | int32 | The widget ID. |
| ifETag | string | Don't delete the widget unless it has this ETag. |

| response | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| notFound | boolean | The widget was not found. |
| conflict | boolean | The widget no longer has the specified ETag. |
